participant_2.background:
I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
I love nature and my garden is a big part of that.
i have not gone home in over two years.
I've lost a lot of things in my life, but losing my diamond at the debutante ball was by far the most difficult.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.

content.text: Hey, pretty good, just getting ready for work. How about you?
I'm good, I just got done working. I love to bake, have you tried any of my cakes?
No, I haven't had the pleasure. I would love to try one though! What's your favorite kind to make?
My favorite is red velvet. I love the chocolate and cream cheese frosting.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely going to have to try it sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd like it. Do you have any hobbies?
I love gardening, and I love nature in general. I'm also really into Christmas tree decorating.
That's so cool! I love Christmas too. I always make my own gingerbread houses.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never tried that before.
You should! It's really easy and a lot of fun.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get into the Christmas spirit
